detectors.description:
DreamMaker.transferOwnership(address) (../../../Desktop/mainnet/0a/0a450affd2172dbfbe1b8729398fadb1c9d3dce7_DreamMaker.sol#66-68) should emit an event for: 
	- owner = newOwner (../../../Desktop/mainnet/0a/0a450affd2172dbfbe1b8729398fadb1c9d3dce7_DreamMaker.sol#67)

DreamMaker.transferOwnership(address).newOwner (../../../Desktop/mainnet/0a/0a450affd2172dbfbe1b8729398fadb1c9d3dce7_DreamMaker.sol#66) lacks a zero-check on :
		- owner = newOwner (../../../Desktop/mainnet/0a/0a450affd2172dbfbe1b8729398fadb1c9d3dce7_DreamMaker.sol#67)
solc-0.4.25 is not recommended for deployment
detectors.markdown: solc-0.4.25 is not recommended for deployment
